creator: sdev1978@rediffmail.com
text: I am trying to override the JAVA_HOME which is pointing to java8.I have java6 and java7 installed in my machine.I have used executable to point to javac7 and fork="yes".I have also use compiler="java1.7" .It still takes the vale from JAVA_HOME.

creator: jaikiran@apache.org
text: What does the target look like and what exactly are you checking when it comes to JAVA_HOME?

creator: sdev1978@rediffmail.com
text:
JAVA_HOME point to the root directory of  JDK1.8 installation
In my case,it is set a JAVA_HOME=C:\Java8 in the environment variables
